meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from the mesoderm layer of an embryo.
meanings.sent1: The mesodermal tissues play a crucial role in the development of the embryo.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the mesodermal layer to understand how embryos grow.
meanings.sent3: The mesodermal cells in the embryo decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like mesodermal cells in an embryo.
meanings.sent5: The mesodermal layer is like a hidden treasure map guiding embryo growth.
